name: vscode-powertools
description: A set of useful and handy tools for Visual Studio Code.

apps.description: One or more apps to register.

oneOf.description: The path to the app script.

isRight.description: Display button on the right side or not.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that app.

importValues.description: Defines a list of properties, which uses (external) values for itself.

(.*).description: The name of the property, which should be set / overwritten.

onCreated.description: The (JavaScript) code to executed after app has been created.

onDestroyed.description: The (JavaScript) code to executed after app has been destroyed.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that app is for.

script.description: The path to the app script.

vue.description: Use Vuetify instead of Bootstrap or not.

buttons.description: One or more buttons to register.

oneOf.description: Executes a Visual Studio Code command.

arguments.description: One or more arguments to pass.

script.description: The path of the script to execute.

silent.description: Do not write result to output.

wait.description: Wait until command has been executed or not.

if.description: The JavaScript code that checks the avaibility of that button.

ifFile.description: The regular expression, that checks if that button should be visible for an active editor or not.

importValues.description: Defines a list of properties, which uses (external) values for itself.

(.*).description: The name of the property, which should be set / overwritten.

isRight.description: Display button on the right side or not.

onCreated.description: The (JavaScript) code to executed after button has been created.

onDestroyed.description: The (JavaScript) code to executed after button has been destroyed.

onEditorChanged.description: The (JavaScript) code to executed after active editor has changed.

platforms.description: One or more platform names, that button is for.

forFolder.description: Indicates if that command can be executed for a current or selected folder or not.
